definition: (prefix indicating ordinal number, e.g. first, number two etc)/order/(old) rank in the imperial examinations/mansion/(literary) but/just
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
first under heaven/number one in the country
first case/first instance/first time (sth is done)
first tone in Mandarin/high, level tone
the person in charge/the head of the leadership group
ranked number one in the world/the world's first
Mandarin Phonetic Symbols 1 (official name of the phonetic system of writing Chinese used in Taiwan)/Bopomofo/abbr. to 注音一式[zhu4 yin1 yi1 shi4]
pinyin: Guo2 yu3 zhu4 yin1 fu2 hao4 di4 yi1 shi4

sentences.english: The first memory bank corresponding to a first range of addresses.
sentences.chinese: 第一存儲體與第一範圍的地址相對應。

sentences.english: The first memory bank corresponding to a first range of addresses.
sentences.chinese: 第一存儲體與第一範圍的地址相對應。

sentences.english: It starts with that deep breath of confidence you take before the first step.
sentences.chinese: 千里之行，開始於邁出第一步前那口自信的深呼吸。

sentences.english: First impressions of Sumatra are not good.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘給我的第一印象並不好。

sentences.english: In the first section are the improvement measures to the legislation of community-based correction.
sentences.chinese: 第一節，我國社區矯正類型的立法完善。

sentences.english: Of these four things , the first is your legal due.
sentences.chinese: 這四種中的第一件是你法律上應享的權力。

sentences.english: The first part: to discuss the main concepts and characteristics of commercial subject.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章，主要介紹商主體的概念和特徵。

sentences.english: Twelve months' non-stop football is doing me well. I feel that I am still growing in form.
sentences.chinese: 這是我這幾年來第一次有這樣的感受。

sentences.english: We recommend you to use the fist way of containing only one hole to play single note.
sentences.chinese: 我們推薦使用第一種方法，口含一孔吹單音。

sentences.english: Last fall, I had my first sleepover.
sentences.chinese: 去年秋天，我有了第一次外宿。

sentences.english: In Nigeria's press, Cecilia Ibru is referred to as the First Lady of Banking.
sentences.chinese: 在尼日利亞新聞界，伊布魯被稱爲銀行界第一夫人。

sentences.english: This is my first stand-alone blog , and it's still under construction.
sentences.chinese: 這是我的第一個獨立博客，還在建設中。

sentences.english: This was my first picture-book, and I was entranced by it.
sentences.chinese: 這是我第一本圖畫書，它讓我深深着迷。

sentences.english: The two boys vied with each other for the first place.
sentences.chinese: 那兩個男孩子爭第一名。

sentences.english: When the article arrived, the editor read the first sentence and then refused to publish it.
sentences.chinese: 稿子寄來後，編輯看第一句話就拒絕予以發表。

sentences.english: So there is the first column, the first column, column 1.  It's the vector [2, -1].
sentences.chinese: 所以這是第一個列向量，向量1。

definition: to stand above/to occupy an important position/to rank (among the top few)
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
to stand side by side/to be juxtaposed
second only to.../(in second place) preceded only by...
